description: MI-803 triple shelf wall mount provides a component shelf and/or mounting solution perfect for any DVD, DVR, cable box, satellite receiver or stereo component up to 66 lbs. This unit is designed to fit under your display and provide an on wall solution for other components such as cable boxes, DVD players, game consoles, and stereo components. Save space and cut back on clutter with this flexible mount solution for your A/V components under your flat-panel TV. It can be used with or without a Plasma/LCD mount.  The integrated gear wheel adjusts the arms for a customized fit every time. Mount arms are padded to cushion your audio visual components as needed. Aluminum construction provides strength and durability. Installation is easy. Comes with Cable Management System. There are three 2.25-Inch holes on the aluminum plate that allow you to cleanly run your cables up to your TV or down to another component, as well as out the bottom to an outlet.
title: Mount-it! MI-803 Triple Shelf Wall Mount - High Gloss Black
